TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1328-1329
TEI.2.document_title: Stpehen F. Austin to People of Colony, 05-08-1826

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to J. H. Polly [about May 8, 1826]. Order for sheriff's sale.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1328-1329

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to J. H. Polly [about May 8, 1826]. Order for sheriff's sale.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-08-1826">[about May 8, 1826.]*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*167.50*/p* *p*85.75*/p*
*p*253. 25*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Sheriff */person_mentioned*of said *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*is hereby commanded to seize and expose to public sale so much of the property of *person_mentioned*J E G*/person_mentioned* the *person_mentioned*defendent */person_mentioned*in the above case as may be sufficient to pay Eighty five dollars and Seventy Cents to the *person_mentioned*Secretary S M Williams*/person_mentioned* 167.50 to the *person_mentioned*Sheriff J. H. Polly*/person_mentioned* and 175.30 to the *person_mentioned*Jurors */person_mentioned*being the amt. of costs due in said case and ordered to be paid by said *person_mentioned*defendent Groce */person_mentioned*by the Judgement of the *location_mentioned*Jurisdiction */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Supreme court of this Jurisdiction */location_mentioned*dated *date_mentioned n="05-08-1826">8th May of this year*/date_mentioned*—and the said *person_mentioned*Sheriff */person_mentioned*will make return of this execution to my *location_mentioned*office */location_mentioned*within *date_mentioned n="07-08-1826">sixty days*/date_mentioned* from this day as respects the *person_mentioned*Secretary*/person_mentioned*'s and *person_mentioned*Sheriff*/person_mentioned*s costs and within *date_mentioned n="08-08-1826">ninety days*/date_mentioned* as respects the *person_mentioned*Juror*/person_mentioned*s fees—*/p*
*p*167.50*/p* *p*37.75*/p*
*p*129. 75 */p* *p*129.30*/p*
*p*85.70*/p*
*p*344. 75*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*[Stephen F. Austin.]*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-08-1826">[About May 8, 1826]*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Department of Texas*/location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Austins Colony*/location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Imla Keep*/person_mentioned* vs. *person_mentioned*Jared E Groce*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Sheriff */person_mentioned*of said *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*is hereby commanded to seize and expose to public sale so much of the property of *person_mentioned*Jared E Groce*/person_mentioned* the *person_mentioned*Defendent */person_mentioned*in the above case as may be sufficient to pay the Sum of Two hundred and fifty three dolls, twenty five cents the amount of costs due in said case to the *person_mentioned*Secretary S. M Williams*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Sheriff*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J. H. Polly*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*[Stephen F. Austin.]*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
